name: gym-backend-microservices
description: Sistema de microservicios para gesti√≥n de gimnasio

scripts.install:all: for service in auth-service user-service membership-service payment-service class-service booking-service trainer-service; do (cd $service && npm install); done
scripts.build:all: for service in auth-service user-service membership-service payment-service class-service booking-service trainer-service; do (cd $service && npm run build); done
